item.title: Docker Laravel and Cron
item.description: This to this post here for the idea. Basically running cron in Docker is easy BUT once the Host had more than one Docker client cron stopped working. No clue why but to solve this I did two things One made a script that was on the Docker Client /scheduler.sh #!/bin/bash php /app/artisan schedule:run --verbose --no-interaction >> /dev/null 2>&1 sleep 60 Then I did this in the Dockerfile COPY scheduler.sh / RUN chmod 755 /scheduler.
